text:
Hi there!

Is there any way to show modules based on page templates or can the default modules be hidden in the content editor? We are building an website using HubSpot and our custom modules number will be Ëœ20-30 modules.
From and editor experience having 50 modules loaded by the CMS defaults will greatly increase the number of available modules and will make content creation harder. Does HubSpot have a filter / function for this?

Thank you!
can you if item count is more than 4 do X else do Y with repeater field?
